question: Kalaripayattu, which was seen in the news recently, is a famous game originating from which state?
explanation:
In the Khelo India Youth Games 2021 Games scheduled to take place in Haryana, four games including Gatka, Kalaripayattu, Thang-Ta and Mallakhamba will be included along with Yogasana. 
Kalaripayattu originated from Kerala and has been practised across the world. Mallakhamba is practised more in Madhya Pradesh and Maharashtra, while Punjab’s Gatka and Manipur’s Thang-Ta are also included.
